mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_content (id, title, img_url, video_url, content, type, view_count, comment_count, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, brief, category_id) VALUES (NULL, #{title}, #{imgUrl}, #{videoUrl}, #{content}, #{type}, 0, 0, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, NULL, NULL, #{brief}, #{categoryId})
mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.title, c.img_url, c.brief, c.type, tc.name AS `categoryName`, c.view_count, c.comment_count, c.create_time FROM t_content AS `c` JOIN t_category AS `tc` ON c.category_id = tc.id WHERE c.type = #{type} AND c.create_by = #{createBy}
